title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Feb 25 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Feb 25 2022
description:
The Ukrainians fighting for their freedom "to the end," including members of parliament, celebrities, and everyday citizens arming themselves. Russian tennis player writes "No War" on camera at tennis match in Dubai. CDC eases indoor mask rules in time for Biden SOTU and expects public to follow complicated, convoluted guidelines that are like a Matt Damon math equation in "Good Will Hunting." Clay and Buck talk to Michael Caputo, the only American to work for the WH and Kremlin, author of “The Ukraine Hoax: How Decades of Corruption in the Former Soviet Republic Led to Trump's Phony Impeachment,” and who has family trapped inside Ukraine. NYC finally removes outdoor mask mandate for schoolchildren.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
